name: lodestone
description: Lodestone is an adaptive knowledge management platform designed to organize and connect concepts, documents, and relationships. It supports visual linking, collaborative knowledge graphs, and self-hosted knowledge bases.
features: Knowledge Management: Visual linking, Concept organization, Relationship mapping. Build connected knowledge bases.
Knowledge Graphs: Interactive visualization, Node connections, Exploration tools. See the big picture.
Collaborative: Multi-user, Shared knowledge, Team workspaces. Build knowledge together.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your knowledge infrastructure.
Visual Linking: Drag-and-drop connections, Relationship types, Bidirectional links. Connect ideas visually.
Document Integration: Attach files, Embed content, Rich media. Comprehensive knowledge capture.
Search & Discovery: Full-text search, Graph exploration, Related concepts. Find information quickly.
Version History: Track changes, Restore versions, Audit trail. Never lose knowledge.
